20110104150632.000|20110104150634.000|CC1|>> I BELIEVE SO.                
20110104150634.000|20110104150637.000|CC1|WE HAD A FORMAL WAY OF GOING    
20110104150637.000|20110104150638.000|CC1|ABOUT -- IF SOMEONE WANTED TO   
20110104150638.000|20110104150641.000|CC1|MAKE A COMPLAINT, THERE WAS A   
20110104150641.000|20110104150643.000|CC1|WAY YOU COULD GO THROUGH IT WITH
20110104150643.000|20110104150644.000|CC1|THE CHAIN OF COMMAND.           
20110104150644.000|20110104150646.000|CC1|IT STARTS AT ONE PERSON AND IT  
20110104150646.000|20110104150648.000|CC1|GOES ALL THE WAY UP, PAST THE XO
20110104150648.000|20110104150651.000|CC1|TO THE CAPTAIN SO IT -- ANYONE  
20110104150651.000|20110104150654.000|CC1|WHO MAKES A FORMAL COMPLAINT, IT
20110104150654.000|20110104150655.000|CC1|GOES ALL THE WAY UP UNTIL THE   
20110104150655.000|20110104150656.000|CC1|PROBLEM IS RESOLVED.            
20110104150656.000|20110104150659.000|CC1|>> AS WE'RE LEARNING, AS CBS    
20110104150659.000|20110104150700.000|CC1|NEWS LEARNED, WE HAVE LEARNED   
20110104150700.000|20110104150702.000|CC1|FROM OFFICIALS HE IS LIKELY     
20110104150702.000|20110104150704.000|CC1|GOING TO LOSE HIS COMMAND OVER  
20110104150704.000|20110104150707.000|CC1|THIS, ESSENTIALLY ENDING CAPTAIN
